snippet: A bomb in a van carrying charcoal exploded in a busy market in northeast Nigeria on Tuesday, killing at least 20 people in an attack thought to have been carried out by Islamist militants, witnesses said.
abstract: Bomb in a van carrying charcoal explodes in a busy market in northeast Nigeria, killing at least 20 people in an attack thought to have been carried out by Islamist militants.
lead_paragraph: A bomb in a van carrying charcoal exploded in a busy market in northeast Nigeria on Tuesday, killing at least 20 people in an attack thought to have been carried out by Islamist militants, witnesses said.
